title: Vegar Gjermundstad
text:
Vegar Heggenes Gjermundstad (born 14 March 1990) is a <a href="Norway">Norwegian</a> <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="Defender%20%28association%20football%29">defender</a> who plays for <a href="F%C3%B8rde%20IL">Førde IL</a>.
Career.
He hails from <a href="Vadheim">Vadheim</a>. He started his career in Vadheim IL and <a href="IL%20H%C3%B8yang">IL Høyang</a>, but moved in 2006 to attend the school <a href="Norsk%20Toppidrettsgymnas">Norsk Toppidrettsgymnas</a> as well as to play for FC Lyn Oslo. In the summer of 2008 he signed for Lyn's senior team. He has two <a href="Tippeligaen">Norwegian Premier League</a> games in <a href="2009%20Norwegian%20Premier%20League">2009</a>, making his debut on 19 April 2009 against <a href="Str%C3%B8msgodset%20IF">Strømsgodset</a> and starting his first game on 3 May 2009 against <a href="Stab%C3%A6k%20Fotball">Stabæk Fotball</a>. His 27th and last game came in May 2010. Following the bankruptcy of Lyn, he joined <a href="Sogndal%20Fotball">Sogndal IL</a> in July 2010.
